message.content:
cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the design and implementation of domain-specific languages and static analysis, which are topics typically covered in the Programming Languages (cs.PL) and Software Engineering (cs.SE) sub-categories. The use of Reference Attribute Grammars (RAGs) and the focus on reusability suggest a potential fit for the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Finally, the evaluation of the approach using a state machine DSL and Java types and packages suggests a potential fit for the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category.
